```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
options(scipen=999) #disables scientific notation when printing
```

###Loading the Data
```{r}
food_supply <- readr::read_csv("data/Food_Supply_Quantity_kg_Data.csv")
```
###Cleaning the Data
```{r}
food_supply_clean <- janitor::clean_names(food_supply)
food_supply_clean
```
###Viewing the Data
```{r}
glimpse(food_supply_clean)
```
```{r}
summary(food_supply_clean)
```

```{r}
food_supply_clean %>%
  naniar::miss_var_summary()
```
###Analysis
```{r}
food_supply_clean %>%
  select(country, deaths) %>%
  arrange(desc(deaths))
```
```{r}
food_supply_clean %>%
  select(country, deaths) %>%
  arrange(-desc(deaths))
```

proteins, obesity vs. country, make bar graph
